channel.title: Email Notification :: ESP3D Ecosystem
channel.description: Email Notification is using SMTP and HTTPS, so you need to collect the following information fof your email supplier smtp server address and https port smtp username/ID smtp password ESP3D use the parameters as follow: token 1 = ID to login to your email supplier token 2 = Password to login to your email supplier token settings = the_recipient email#smtp_server:port where # and : are fields separators. For example: luc@gmail.com#smtp.gmail.com:465
